comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The Austrian cavalry might have been in the news because of this incident, in NYT at query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9D05E2D8113FE633A... "By AUSTIN WEST. Special Correspondent of THE NEW YORK TIMES and The London Daily Chronicle. Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES. August 14, 1914, Friday MILAN, Aug. 13. -- How 5,000 Cossacks annihilated two picked Austrian cavalry regiments from Lemberg is told graphically in a dispatch which has reached the Corriore d'Italia by way of Trieste."
